account_sid.description: The unique identifier of the account related to the service.

consumption_report_interval.description: The interval at which consumption reports are generated.

date_created.description: The date and time when the service was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the service was last updated.

default_channel_creator_role_sid.description: The default role assigned to the creator of a channel.

default_channel_role_sid.description: The default role assigned to all users in a channel.

default_service_role_sid.description: The default role assigned to users of the service.

friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name given to the service.

channel_members.description: Maximum number of members allowed in a channel.

user_channels.description: Maximum number of channels a user can belong to.

links.description: Links to different resources related to the service.

pre_webhook_retry_count.description: Number of retries for the pre webhook.

post_webhook_retry_count.description: Number of retries for the post webhook.

reachability_enabled.description: Flag indicating if reachability is enabled.

read_status_enabled.description: Flag indicating if read status is enabled.

sid.description: The unique identifier of the service.

size_limit_mb.description: Maximum size limit for media in megabytes.

compatibility_message.description: Message to display for incompatible media.
